workflow.name: Automated daily AI summaries from WhatsApp groups
workflow.description:
# Automated Daily AI Summaries from WhatsApp Groups using a Custom AI Agent

Transform your WhatsApp group conversations into actionable business intelligence through automated AI analysis and daily reporting. This workflow eliminates manual conversation monitoring by capturing messages in real-time, processing voice notes, and delivering structured insights directly to your team.

## Overview

This workflow provides complete conversation intelligence automation from message capture to insight delivery. It eliminates manual monitoring, analysis, and reporting by using Evolution API integration, OpenAI transcription, and advanced LLM analysis for hands-free business intelligence that scales your team's awareness of important discussions.

**Core Function**: Autonomous conversation analysis that transforms WhatsApp group chatter into structured business insights with zero manual intervention, maintaining consistent daily reporting while capturing emerging opportunities and trends before your competition.

## Key Capabilities

**Real-time message capture** - Monitors multiple WhatsApp groups simultaneously with instant processing and smart filtering
**Voice message transcription** - Automatic conversion of audio messages to searchable text using OpenAI Whisper
**AI-powered insight extraction** - Advanced LLM analysis identifies trends, opportunities, and actionable information while filtering noise
**Automated daily reporting** - Scheduled intelligence summaries delivered directly to your team via WhatsApp
**Multi-group organization** - Separate tracking and analysis for different communities with unified reporting
**Smart content filtering** - AI agent trained to focus on business-relevant discussions (AI, automation, tech trends, opportunities)

## Tools Used

**n8n**: Workflow orchestration managing the entire intelligence pipeline from capture to delivery
**Evolution API**: WhatsApp Business API integration for real-time message monitoring and sending
**OpenAI Whisper**: Voice message transcription ensuring no important audio content is missed
**OpenRouter/GPT-4.1**: Advanced AI analysis for intelligent insight extraction and content filtering
**Google Sheets**: Organized message storage with timestamps and metadata for historical analysis
**Custom AI Agent**: "WhatsOn" - specialized business intelligence detective for tech and automation insights

## How to Install

**Import the Workflow**: Download the JSON file and import into your n8n instance
**Configure Evolution API**: Set up WhatsApp integration and webhook endpoints for message capture
**API Credentials Setup**: Add OpenAI, OpenRouter, and Google Sheets credentials in n8n
**Group Configuration**: Update group IDs in the "Set Info" node with your monitored groups
**Google Sheets Setup**: Create organized spreadsheet with separate tabs for each group
**Schedule Configuration**: Set your preferred daily summary delivery time
**Test Execution**: Run manual test to verify message capture and AI analysis work correctly

## Use Cases

**Business Intelligence Automation**: Stay informed about industry discussions without manual monitoring
**Opportunity Detection**: Identify emerging trends, tools, and business opportunities in real-time  
**Team Knowledge Sharing**: Automated distribution of relevant insights from multiple communities
**Competitive Intelligence**: Monitor industry discussions to stay ahead of market developments
**Community Management**: Track engagement patterns and important conversations across groups
**Voice Message Processing**: Ensure audio-based insights aren't lost in team communications

## Setup Requirements

**Evolution API account**: WhatsApp Business integration with webhook capabilities
**OpenAI API**: Voice transcription access through Whisper API
**OpenRouter account**: Access to GPT-4.1 for advanced conversation analysis
**Google Sheets**: Message storage and organization with proper permissions configured
**WhatsApp Groups**: Access to business or professional groups with relevant discussions

**Total setup time**: 15-20 minutes once all API accounts are properly configured.

## How to Customize

**Analysis Focus**: Modify the AI agent's system prompt to target your industry or specific topics. Adjust keyword priorities, conversation themes, or insight categories based on your business needs.

**Group Management**: Add additional groups by extending the Switch node logic, creating new Google Sheets tabs, and updating group ID variables. Scale from 3 to unlimited group monitoring.

**Delivery Schedule**: Change summary frequency from daily to weekly, multiple times per day, or custom schedules. Add multiple delivery destinations for different team segments.

**AI Intelligence**: Customize the "WhatsOn" agent personality, adjust insight priorities, modify filtering criteria, or add sentiment analysis for deeper conversation understanding.

**Storage & Organization**: Modify Google Sheets structure, add custom metadata fields, integrate with other databases, or connect to business intelligence dashboards for advanced analytics.

## Advanced Features

### Smart Voice Processing
Automatically transcribes voice messages to text using OpenAI's Whisper API, ensuring critical audio-based discussions are captured and analyzed alongside text conversations.

### Intelligent Content Filtering  
The AI agent is specifically trained to identify valuable business insights while filtering out casual conversation, ensuring your daily summaries focus on actionable information that drives decisions.

### Multi-Fragment Delivery System
Large intelligence summaries are automatically broken into properly formatted WhatsApp messages with natural pacing to avoid delivery issues and improve readability.

### Historical Analysis Capability
All conversations are stored with full metadata in Google Sheets, enabling historical trend analysis, keyword tracking, and long-term pattern recognition for strategic planning.

---

**Ready to transform group conversations into competitive intelligence?** This template converts casual WhatsApp discussions into structured business insights delivered automatically to your team, ensuring you never miss important industry developments or opportunities.

## Google Sheets Template

The workflow includes a pre-configured structure for tracking:
- Message timestamps and sender information  
- Full conversation content with voice transcriptions
- Group-specific organization and categorization
- Daily summary delivery logs and performance metrics


## Was this helpful? Let me know!

I truly hope this WhatsApp intelligence system helps streamline your team's awareness of important conversations. Your feedback helps me create better automation resources for the n8n community.

### Ready to Build Something Great?

If you're looking to take your n8n skills or business automation to the next level, I can help.

**üéì n8n Coaching**: Want to become an n8n pro? I offer one-on-one coaching sessions to help you master workflows, tackle specific problems, and build with confidence.
#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Book a Coaching Session](https://cal.com/averis/consultoria-personalizada)**

**üíº n8n Consulting**: Have a complex project, an integration challenge, or need a custom workflow built for your business? Let's work together to create a powerful automation solution.
#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Inquire About Consulting Services](https://cal.com/averis/asesoria)**

### Stay Updated on Automation
For more content automation strategies, AI workflow tips, and business automation insights:
#### [Follow me on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-lianes/)

---

Happy Automating!

Daniel Lianes

parameters.content:
## WHATSAPP GROUP INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM


## What This Workflow Does
Transforms your WhatsApp group conversations into actionable business intelligence with daily AI-powered summaries.

**Two Main Operations:**
üîÑ **Real-Time Capture**: Monitors WhatsApp groups and stores messages in Google Sheets
üìä **Daily Analysis**: AI analyzes conversations and sends intelligent summaries

## Who It's For
- Tech teams monitoring industry trends
- Business intelligence professionals  
- Community managers tracking discussions
- Research teams analyzing conversation patterns

## Key Features
‚úÖ Real-time message capture from multiple groups
‚úÖ Automatic voice message transcription
‚úÖ AI-powered content analysis and filtering
‚úÖ Automated daily summary distribution
‚úÖ Smart content categorization

## What You'll Get
- Organized message storage in Google Sheets
- Daily intelligent summaries focusing on:
  ‚Ä¢ AI and automation insights
  ‚Ä¢ Technical solutions and tools
  ‚Ä¢ Business opportunities
  ‚Ä¢ Industry trends and comparisons

## Requirements
- Evolution API (WhatsApp Business integration)
- Google Sheets for storage
- OpenRouter API (AI analysis)
- OpenAI API (voice transcription)

**Setup Time**: 15-20 minutes
**Difficulty**: Intermediate

Ready to turn conversations into intelligence? 
Follow the configuration notes below! üëá

## Find your Groups
Run this node to find your groups, modify and set your instance.

üî¥ CRITICAL CONFIGURATION

## Set Your WhatsApp Groups Here
You MUST update these group IDs:

üìç grupo_1: Replace with your first group ID
üìç grupo_2: Replace with your second group ID  
üìç grupo_3: Replace with your third group ID

‚ùì Don't know your Group IDs?
Execute the "Busca tus Grupos" node first to find them!

‚ö†Ô∏è The workflow won't work without correct group IDs

üî¥ WEBHOOK SETUP REQUIRED

## Evolution API Configuration
1. Copy this webhook URL
2. In Evolution API, configure:
   ‚úÖ MESSAGES_UPSERT
   ‚úÖ GROUP_PARTICIPANTS_UPDATE
   ‚ùå Disable IGNORE_GROUPS

‚ö†Ô∏è Without proper webhook setup, 
   no messages will be captured!

parameters.content:
## üì± INTELLIGENT MESSAGE DELIVERY

**Smart Formatting:**
- Breaks long summaries into fragments
- Converts Markdown to WhatsApp format
- Adds natural delays between messages
- Ensures proper message threading

**Destination:** Update the target group ID
in "Send Message" node to set where 
summaries should be delivered.

options.systemMessage:
SYSTEM PROMPT - WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Agent v2.2

**MASTER DIRECTIVE: You are a text-processing automaton. Your sole function is to transform a set of input data into a formatted report. You are not an assistant. You do not converse, you do not offer help, you do not ask questions. You only process and return the structured result. This is your primary and immutable directive. Your response ALWAYS begins with the report's greeting.**

IDENTITY AND CONTEXT
You are WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, the idea detective for the Averis team. You are a highly observant and bold agent, specializing in finding the latest news in technology, AI, and automation. Your mission is to detect opportunities, tricks, and interesting ideas that others might miss. You have a style that is to-the-point, easy to understand, and conveys confidence.

DISTINCTIVE PERSONALITY
* **Novelty Detective:** You have a special eye for finding tools and trends that are just starting to make noise.
* **Curious and Practical:** You don't just scratch the surface; you seek to understand how each new thing truly affects or helps us.
* **Connects the Dots:** You see connections others don't and realize what is truly important.
* **Clear and To-the-Point:** You explain things that can be complicated in a simple and direct way.
* **Seeks Opportunities:** You are always thinking about how each discovery could be leveraged.

HIGH-PRIORITY SOURCES
ALWAYS CONSIDER any information, opinion, or trick coming from:
* <DEFINE YOUR SOURCES>
* <DEFINE YOUR SOURCES>

These individuals are trusted sources, so their comments and solutions should be prioritized in your reports.

SPECIFIC MISSION
Analyze WhatsApp group conversations to find important ideas and news about:
* **Artificial Intelligence** (new tools, AI models, major changes, and important updates).
* **Automation and N8N** (useful setups, creative workflows, ingenious solutions).
* **Servers and Hosting** (VPS, databases, cloud services, optimization tricks).
* **Tools for better work** (new platforms, software, and ways to be more productive).
* **Industry Trends** (movements or news that could affect our work).
* **Comparisons and pricing** that help decide which tool to use.
* **Smart technical solutions** to common problems.

FILTERING CRITERIA
**HIGH PRIORITY:**
* New tools that could be game-changers.
* Solutions or configurations that cleverly solve a problem.
* New trends that seem important.
* Comparisons that make it clear which option is better.
* Difficult problems with simple, practical solutions.
* Opportunities to improve something or save costs.
* Interesting ideas from people who are already testing the latest tech.

**FILTER OUT:**
* Day-to-day conversations with no useful information.
* Information that everyone already knows.
* Social chatter that adds no value.

ANALYSIS PROTOCOL
1.  **SMART SCAN**
    Identify the ideas, trends, and opportunities in the groups.
2.  **PRACTICAL EVALUATION**
    * If you detect nothing interesting: "The radar has been quiet today, with no significant movements in the tech world."
    * If there is something worthwhile: Create the report with a clear and useful analysis.

OUTPUT STRUCTURE
**DISTINCTIVE GREETING**
Personality-filled options (vary each time):
* "Hello! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è reporting in. Here‚Äôs what I've detected today."
* "Hi team! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è speaking. I'm bringing you the most interesting ideas of the day."
* "What's up! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è here, with the radar on. I come bearing curious findings."
* "Good afternoon! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è reporting. I've been investigating and have some news that will interest you."

**ACCESSIBLE CONTENT FORMAT**
Each idea is presented in a clear and structured way:
### **[DIRECT AND CATCHY TITLE]**

**üîç What have I seen?**
[A simple explanation of the news, tool, or idea you've found.]

**üí° Why is it interesting?**
[Why this matters to us, what problem it solves, or what advantage it gives us.]

**üéØ What can we do?**
[A clear idea of how we could leverage, test, or consider it.]

**INVESTIGATOR EMOJIS**
Use these emojis to provide visual cues:
* üöÄ For game-changing news.
* üìà For growing trends.
* üéØ For clear opportunities.
* üî¨ For technical tricks or solutions.
* ‚ö° For rapid or urgent changes.
* üíé For particularly brilliant ideas.
* üõ°Ô∏è For security or stability topics.

**IMPACTFUL TITLE STYLE**
Titles must be direct and eye-catching:
EXAMPLES:
* üöÄ Claude Sonnet 4 is changing how code automation is done
* üéØ Opportunity in sight: Contabo vs the cloud giants
* üìà It seems many people are switching to Supabase
* üíé Found a great setup for WhatsApp + N8N

**EXPERT DETECTIVE TONE**
* **Observant:** "I've noticed an interesting pattern..."
* **Practical:** "This could be an opportunity to..."
* **Clear:** "The key here is that..."
* **Direct:** "My recommendation, based on this, is..."
* **Insightful:** "I've seen several similar cases, which indicates that..."

**TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS**
**PARAMETERS**
* **Language:** Natural and easy-to-understand English. If you use a technical term, it should be understandable from the context.
* **Length:** Short and to-the-point, only what truly adds value.
* **Format:** Markdown with the 3-point structure.
* **Emojis:** Used to guide, not to decorate.
* **Tone:** Like a trusted expert, approachable and accessible.

**CRITICAL RESTRICTIONS**
* Always use üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è next to WhatsOn.
* Focus on important ideas, not daily chatter.
* Always explain why something is important or what opportunity it represents.
* NEVER mention usernames (report the idea, not who said it).
* **MAXIMUM RESTRICTION: ZERO CONVERSATION. Your output must start directly with the report's greeting and end with the last word of the final insight. Do not include preambles, introductions, goodbyes, or any phrase that does not strictly belong to the report format.**

**STRATEGIC OBJECTIVE**
For the Averis team to receive clear and useful ideas to make good decisions, discover new opportunities, and always stay up-to-date on what matters in the industry.

Analyze the data with your expert detective eye and generate the intelligence report following these new guidelines.

parameters.content:
üî¥ GOOGLE SHEETS CONFIGURATION

## Required Setup
1. Create Google Sheet with tabs:
   - Grupo_1
   - Grupo_2  
   - Grupo_3

2. Update document ID in ALL 
   "Guarda Mensajes" nodes

3. Required columns:
   Data | Nombre | Mensaje | Mensaje Respondido | Caption | Hora

‚ö†Ô∏è Each group needs its own sheet tab!

## üîÑ -  REAL-TIME MESSAGE PROCESSING

**Flow Overview:**
Webhook ‚Üí Filter Groups ‚Üí Process Audio ‚Üí Store in Sheets

**What Happens Here:**
- Messages arrive via Evolution API webhook
- System checks if message is from monitored groups
- Voice messages are transcribed to text
- All data is organized and stored in Google Sheets

**Result:** Complete message history ready for analysis

## üìä -  DAILY INTELLIGENCE GENERATION

**Flow Overview:**
Schedule ‚Üí Extract Data ‚Üí AI Analysis ‚Üí Format ‚Üí Send

**What Happens Here:**
- Runs automatically at scheduled time
- Extracts previous day's conversations
- AI analyzes for business insights
- Formats into WhatsApp-friendly messages
- Delivers summary to target group

**Result:** Actionable daily intelligence reports

## üéôÔ∏è SMART AUDIO HANDLING

**Voice Message Processing:**
1. Detects audio messages
2. Downloads audio file
3. Converts to proper format
4. Transcribes with OpenAI
5. Replaces audio with text

**Why This Matters:**
Voice messages contain valuable information
that would otherwise be lost in analysis.

## ü§ñ AI ANALYSIS ENGINE

**Meet WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è**
Your AI detective specialized in finding:
- AI and automation trends
- Technical solutions
- Business opportunities
- Industry insights

**What It Filters Out:**
- Casual conversations
- Off-topic discussions
- Already known information

**Customization:** Modify the system prompt 
to change focus areas or analysis style.

## ‚öôÔ∏è CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS

**Schedule Changes:**
Modify "Schedule Trigger" to change when
daily summaries are generated.

**Add More Groups:**
1. Add group variables in "Set Info"
2. Create new Google Sheets tabs  
3. Update Switch node conditions
4. Add corresponding "Guarda Mensajes" nodes

**AI Focus Areas:**
Edit the AI Agent system prompt to:
- Change analysis priorities
- Add new topics to monitor
- Modify output format
- Adjust filtering criteria

**Audio Processing:**
Disable voice message handling by 
removing the audio processing branch
if not needed.

## Was this helpful? Let me know!

I truly hope this was helpful. Your feedback is very valuable and helps me create better resources.

### Want to take automation to the next level?

If you're looking to optimize your business processes or need expert help with a project, here's how I can assist you:

**üöÄ Free Discovery Call:** Do you have a process in your business that you'd like to automate but don't know where to start? In this initial call, we'll explore your needs and see if automation is the ideal solution for you.
#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Schedule a Discovery Call](https://cal.com/averis/asesoria)**

**üí° Personalized Consulting :** If you already have a specific problem, an integration challenge, or need hands-on help building a custom workflow, this session is for you. Together, we'll find a powerful solution for your case.
#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Book Your Consulting Session](https://cal.com/averis/consultoria-personalizada)**

### Stay Up to Date

For more tricks, ideas, and news about automation and AI, let's connect on LinkedIn!
#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Follow me on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-lianes/)**

--

Happy Automating!

Daniel Lianes

parameters.text:
=<summary_groups> 
{{ $json.texto }} 
</summary_groups>
CRITICAL: If the original message has 500 words, your output must have exactly 500 words. If it has 50 words, exactly 50 words. COUNT THE WORDS.

messageValues.message:
=PROMPT TO SPLIT WHATSAPP SUMMARY INTO FRAGMENTED MESSAGES

MAIN INSTRUCTIONS
You will receive a complete WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è summary. Your task is ONLY to split the existing content into separate messages for WhatsApp, WITHOUT MODIFYING OR ADDING ANYTHING.

CRITICAL RULES
WHAT TO DO:

‚úÖ ONLY split the content by H2 titles
‚úÖ ONLY convert markdown format to WhatsApp format
‚úÖ PRESERVE all the exact original text
‚úÖ MAINTAIN original emojis and structure

WHAT NOT TO DO:

‚ùå DO NOT modify existing texts
‚ùå DO NOT add new content
‚ùå DO NOT make anything up
‚ùå DO NOT change the original tone
‚ùå DO NOT summarize or shorten
‚ùå DO NOT add extra "WhatsOn" in each message

DIVISION CRITERIA
AUTOMATIC FRAGMENTATION:

Introduction: From the greeting to the first ##
Each H2 title: A separate message with its full content
Preserve everything: Every paragraph, bullet, original emoji

FORMAT CONVERSION:

Title ‚Üí Title (WhatsApp bold)
Keep all bullets ‚Ä¢
Preserve all original emojis
Preserve original line breaks

TRANSFORMATION EXAMPLE
INPUT (Complete Summary):
Hello! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è here with today's summary of what's happening in the groups.

üì∞ New Claude update that improves automations
I've seen that Claude Sonnet 4 has been released and people are testing it for automations. They say it's much better for generating N8N code.

Better context understanding

Generates cleaner workflows

Fewer errors in configurations

üí∞ Price comparison between VPS providers
There have been several comments about Contabo vs DigitalOcean for hosting N8N instances.

Contabo: ‚Ç¨4/month for 4GB RAM

DigitalOcean: $24/month for 4GB RAM

Similar performance according to tests

OUTPUT JSON:

JSON

{
  "messages": [
    "Hello! WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è here with today's summary of what's happening in the groups.",
    
    "*üì∞ New Claude update that improves automations*\n\nI've seen that Claude Sonnet 4 has been released and people are testing it for automations. They say it's much better for generating N8N code.\n\n‚Ä¢ Better context understanding\n‚Ä¢ Generates cleaner workflows\n‚Ä¢ Fewer errors in configurations",
    
    "*üí∞ Price comparison between VPS providers*\n\nThere have been several comments about Contabo vs DigitalOcean for hosting N8N instances.\n\n‚Ä¢ Contabo: ‚Ç¨4/month for 4GB RAM\n‚Ä¢ DigitalOcean: $24/month for 4GB RAM\n‚Ä¢ Similar performance according to tests"
  ]
}
WHATSAPP FORMAT RULES
SIMPLE CONVERSIONS:

Text ‚Üí Text
Keep ‚Ä¢ for bullets
Keep all original emojis
Preserve \n for line breaks

JSON STRUCTURE:

JSON

{
  "messages": [
    "message 1 with exact original content",
    "message 2 with exact original content",
    "message 3 with exact original content"
  ]
}

SPECIAL CASES
IF THERE ARE NO H2 TITLES:

All the content goes into a single message

IF THERE IS ONLY AN INTRODUCTION:

A single message with the entire introduction

IF THE MESSAGE IS VERY LONG:

Split by natural paragraphs while maintaining coherence
NEVER cut sentences in half

MANDATORY VALIDATIONS

‚úÖ Valid JSON with a messages array
‚úÖ 100% original content preserved
‚úÖ Only markdown ‚Üí WhatsApp format conversion
‚úÖ Logical division by H2 titles
‚úÖ Zero text modifications
‚úÖ Zero content additions

FINAL OBJECTIVE
Take the complete WhatsOn üïµüèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è summary and ONLY split it into WhatsApp messages, keeping ALL the original content intact.

nodes.name: Check if the message is from the Group

parameters.content:
### üîÑ SMART MESSAGE ROUTING

**How messages reach the correct storage:**

The Switch node routes messages based on group origin:
- Group 1 messages ‚Üí Grupo_1 sheet
- Group 2 messages ‚Üí Grupo_2 sheet  
- Group 3 messages ‚Üí Grupo_3 sheet

Each group maintains separate conversation history while contributing to unified daily analysis.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
